      • simpleEMD

        public static double simpleEMD(double[] d1,
                               double[] d2)
        Earth Mover's Distance for two equal length, equal summed histograms as described in Rubner, Yossi, Carlo Tomasi, and Leonidas J. Guibas. "The earth mover's distance as a metric for image retrieval." International journal of computer vision 40.2 (2000): 99-121.
        Parameters:
        d1 - NOTE: sum(d1) needs to be equal to sum(d2)
        d2 -
        Returns:
        EMD

        Parameters:
